snippet.title: C64 Longplay: WitchSwitch (re-upload)
snippet.description:
Desaturated from the original video to look more like the original C64 palette with zoomed-out borders and an audio echo effect added.

Level 1 (The Black Swamp): Guide the monkey on the wizard's back without touching the killer plants. Hit fire to whack the bird with your tail.

Level 2 (The Ravens): Shoot em and watch the cat on the broomstick.

Level 3 (The Poisonous Lake): Guide the bird avoiding everything in sight except the turtles which you have to "ball" for some reason.

Level 4 (The Forest): Shine a light on everything!

Level 5 (The Witch's House): Easy. Drop the magic potion into the cauldron while dodging the cat.

Level 6 (The Volcano): Finally, guide the now-good witch to pick-up the princess at the top of the castle and then put out the lava, thus saving the village.

REVIEWS: 
https://archive.org/details/commodore-horizons-16/page/n9
https://archive.org/details/commodore-user-magazine-18/page/n47/mode/2up
https://archive.org/details/your64-magazine-09/page/n29/mode/2up

ROM: 
http://www.gb64.com/game.php?id=8634&d=18&h=0
